Guys, it seems like it's not cracked, but the entire folder IS the crack folder.

WALKTHROUGH OF THE DOWNLOAD
Ok, I known you may be frustrated cuz you have no idea wtf to do.
1. double click setup and download AVS
2.When in the setup, it should give you the installation directory, it's a long gibberish of something that looks like this:
a.C:/Program Files/AVS4YOU/AVSVideoConverter
b.C:\Program Files (x86)\AVS4YOU\AVSVideoConverter
you want to copy paste that
3.When the download is finished, drag the AVSVideoConverter file into the installation directory, that's the thing I told you to copy paste
4.Replace the original file
5. You're ready to use it
